title: Confirm MLB.com logo links to http://mlb.com/ in the same tab

Delayed/final games display tricodes, scores and game state
Games update in realtime

Clicking on a specific date updates the out-of-town scoreboard with games for that date

(All states) Confirm hover over Gameday Audio icon displays "No Feeds Available" if feeds are not available

(Not Logged In) - Confirm clicking on the audio icon displays the sign in page
(Not Logged In) Confirm that after successful login, the user is returned to Gameday
(Logged In) Confirm "Sign out" option is presented when hovering over the Gameday Audio icon
(Logged In/Unentitled) Confirm clicking an audio feed does not start playback
(Logged In/Entitled) Confirm that when audio feed is started, play/pause work correctly
(Logged In/Entitled) Confirm that when audio feed is started, tricode: call letters are displayed
(All states) Confirm clicking MLB.TV icon displays "No Feeds Available" if feeds are not available
(Not Logged In) - Confirm clicking on the MLB.TV icon displays the sign in page
(Logged In/Unentitled) Confirm that after successful login, the user is presented with an upsell for MLB.TV
(Logged In/Entitled) Confirm that after successful login, the user is presented with the home feed

custom_preconds:
SPEC: https://wiki.mlbam.com/display/SD/Jingles+Specs+and+Availability+2016

GIVEN jingles exist for the following:
-Balk
-Caught Stealing
-Double
-Double Play
-Error
-Hit by Pitch
-Homerun
-Passed ball
-Pickedoff
-Pinch run
-Pinch Hit
-Pitch change
-Sacrifice bunt
-Sacrifice fly
-Single
-Stolen base
-Strikeout
-Triple
-Triple play
-Walk
-Wild Pitch
custom_steps: WHEN a jingle event is strung using the stringer tool
custom_expected: THEN the appropriate jingle image appears in Gameday
